Package com.percussion.extensions.cms

Class Summary
PSAddUserControlsToTree A Rhythmyx post-exit to load all user control XML documents from the file system and add to the result document.
PSCheckIfVariantIsInUse This exit checks to see if a given variant is in use in the system.
PSCloneOverrideField This is a generic UDF that can be used to compute field value to override when cloning.
PSCmsObjectNameLookup This class implements the UDF processor interface so it can be used as a Rhythmyx function.
PSCopySiteDef 3 html parameters are expected: sys_originalSiteName, sys_newSiteName and sys_newFolderPath.
PSGetRelationshipProps Get the properties of a specified relationship in the following format:
PSModifySiteDefs 2 parameters are expected: sys_originalPath and sys_newPath.
PSSearchCommunityHandler Walk the search properties in the request document.
PSSelectAASlots Filter the set of slots returned by contentvariantslotlist
